title: Implement real-time KPI updates via WebSocket
description: Replace polling-based KPI updates with WebSocket connections for real-time dashboard refresh. Include connection fallback and reconnection logic.

title: Add dark mode theme support
description: Implement comprehensive dark mode theme with system preference detection and manual toggle. Update all components and ensure accessibility compliance.

title: Create Mermaid diagram renderer with fallback
description: Build dynamic Mermaid diagram component with loading states, error handling, and fallback to static images when rendering fails.

title: Implement Kanban board drag and drop
description: Add drag-and-drop functionality to Kanban board for task status updates. Include visual feedback, validation, and undo functionality.

title: Add comprehensive error handling and monitoring
description: Implement global error boundaries, error tracking, and user-friendly error messages. Include integration with monitoring services.

title: Create ADR template generator
description: Build interactive form for creating new ADRs following MADR format. Include validation, preview, and automatic file generation.

title: Implement risk matrix heat map visualization
description: Create interactive heat map for risk probability vs impact matrix with hover details, filtering, and drill-down capabilities.

title: Set up automated testing pipeline
description: Configure comprehensive testing suite with unit tests, integration tests, and E2E tests. Include CI/CD pipeline integration.

title: Add multi-language support (i18n)
description: Implement internationalization with Norwegian and English language support. Include date/time formatting and number localization.

title: Create data export functionality
description: Allow users to export dashboard data in multiple formats (JSON, CSV, PDF reports). Include custom date ranges and filtering options.

title: Implement search functionality across all content
description: Add global search that indexes tasks, ADRs, risks, and changelog entries. Include fuzzy matching and result ranking.

title: Add performance monitoring dashboard
description: Create dedicated section for monitoring application performance metrics, API response times, and user experience indicators.
